皅字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【白字部】　皅； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页786第11
【集韻】披巴切，怕平聲。艸華之白也。【說文】本作葩。　又【集韻】步化切，音杷。色不眞也。【廣韻】作?。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Bai Zi Department] 　皅; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 786 to 11
【Jiyun】Pi Baqie, afraid of flat sound. Hua Zhibai also. [Said the text] This is a wonderful work.　[Jiyun] step by step, sound loquat. The color is not silly. [Guang Yun] For?.
